attributes.action: Cap Fuel Duty so the duty element does not exceed the rate of inflation in any given year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cap fuel duty at a level whereby whatever increase there is in the price of oil, the fuel duty value associated with the pre-tax price of fuel does not exceed the underlying rate of inflation in any given year.  This would mean that the treasury would not benefit from their "cut" of any oil price increases over and above inflation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
